buginformation.description: Dupe glitch. When using the QIO Dashboard. Simply press both the left and right mouse keys rapidly and it item count will occasionally go up by one. Mekanism-1.16.1-10.0.1.424.jar MekanismAdditions-1.16.1-10.0.1.424.jar MekanismGenerators-1.16.1-10.0.1.424.jar MekanismTools-1.16.1-10.0.1.424.jar

*Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* #### Issue description: Render error ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7188938/72199185-6ba3c600-3473-11ea-905e-76adedc324b4.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7188938/72199186-70687a00-3473-11ea-9258-da90780351c6.png) #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge:30.0.36 **Mekanism:9.9.1.392 **Other relevant version:** #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/) / etc link here. Please make sure that it isn't set to expire.]

*Please use the search functionality before reporting an issue. Also take a look at the closed issues!* Checked #### Issue description: The Tag and ID mod filters don't work ItemStack works #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Place a digital miner next to my home 2. plug elec cable on its left 3. go to config 4. New Filter > Tag > ore* > check > save > start 5. Or New Filter > Mod ID > 15 (iron_ore) >check > save > start #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge: 30.30 **Mekanism: 9.9.0.391 **Other relevant version: MC 1.15.1 #### If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here: (_It's almost always relevant_) [[gist](https://gist.github.com/) / [pastebin](https://pastebin.com/) / etc link here. Please make sure that it isn't set to expire.]

**Issue description:** You can duplicate items using a Digital Miner **Steps to reproduce:** 1. Place a Digital Miner in the ground 2. Put items inside a stackable block that holds items in after being broken(Like RFTools Crafter) 3. Put more "RFTools Crafters" in the ground 5. Set a filter in the Digital Miner to mine the Crafters(Fuzzy Mode:ON) 6. Turn on the digital miner 7. All the collected crafters by the miner will be the same as the first (See the video for more info) **Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting):** **Forge:** 1.12.2 - 14.23.5.2836 **Mekanism:** Mekanism-1.12.2-9.7.3.374 **If a (crash)log is relevant for this issue, link it here:** https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IKg_pf44QBo

Issue description: **If you insert Ethylene tank into Gas Generator game just FREEZE to death.** Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge: **2784** **Mekanism: **Mekanism-1.12.2-9.7.2.373**

buginformation.summary: [1.12.2] Atomic Disassembler in Vein Mode does not fell Menril Trees
buginformation.description: #### Issue description: Atomic Disassembler in Vein Mode does not fell Menril Trees from Integrated Dynamics. The tree is correctly oredict but Disassembler ignores. #### Steps to reproduce: 1. Set Atomic Disassembler to Vein Mode 2. Hit Menril Tree 3. ????? 4. No profit #### Version (make sure you are on the latest version before reporting): **Forge: 14.23.2.2611** **Mekanism: 9.4.3.330** **Other relevant version: Integrated Dynamics v0.11.2**
